Sure.. I'll offer up our gear list.

Digital Cameras
Video cameras with nig=
ht vision (we have several different kinds and brands)
KII meter
Emf Meter
=
IR security cameras with a DVR wired.. not wireless.
Digital Video Recorder=
s
Thermal Imaging camera- when we can get use of it (we have a coast guard =
member and a fire fighter on our team both of which can get the cameras fro=
m time to time)
Motion detectors
Scout Cameras
Laser trap (a home made lase=
r grid that has motion detectors on it.. we keep a video camera on it and i=
f the grid gets broken.. well.. then we might have caught something)
Flashl=
ights
Two way radios
UV flashlights
Oh.. of course pen & paper..

and we ar=
e working on a couple alternate light source cameras 
We have also experime=
nted with negative ions using an ionizer.. that is still in the works

  --=
--- Original Message ----- 
  From: Chad 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  =
Sent: Friday, August 08, 2008 11:28 PM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] A question for =
the ghost hunters of the group


  Care to give a rundown of the equipment =
you use?
